explains: n. 外展服务，扩大范围的服务；主动帮助
v. 超出……的限度或范围；超过，胜出；伸出双臂
adj. 外展服务的，扩大服务范围的

sentences.en: Their brief is to undertake outreach work aimed at young African Americans.
sentences.cn: 他们的任务是承担主动帮助年轻美国黑人的工作。

sentences.en: Du thanks her parents, who for years have taken her to student outreach activities, for supporting her interest in science, technology, engineering and math.
sentences.cn: 杜感谢父母多年来带她参加学生拓展活动，感谢他们支持她对科学、技术、工程和数学的兴趣。

sentences.en: Reconstruction was only part of a scheme that would include a major exhibition and an extensive educational and outreach programme.
sentences.cn: 重建只是计划的一部分，该计划还包括一个大型展览和一个具有广泛教育意义的推广方案。
